questions.question: It is usually not necessary to use looping in your FME workspace.
How many features fall in Flood Risk zone 1?
Why did we use an AttributeRenamer in step 6?
options: We wanted to change the name of our calculated flood risk variable from FloodRisk to DangerZone
The AttributeRenamer calculated the value of FloodRisk
We wanted to expose the _band{}.value list attribute created by the PointOnRasterValueExtractor so we could view it in Table View (and the AttributeManager) as Elevation
